QuestData.Title: Crystal Clearing
QuestData.Description: This portal is a problem. With it they can summon countless reserves.$b$bThe crystals nearby seem to be powering the gate. If we destroy those, we can set them back significantly.
QuestData.CompletionText: Each crystal destroyed makes it that much harder to open the portal again.
QuestData.RewardText: Nice work. They will not be opening that portal again any time soon.
